    Personal Profile 
Experience 
Company : Integral UK, LTD 
Role:  Graduate critical systems engineer 
From:  Nov 2010 to Oct 2012 
Company:  Integral UK, LTD 
Role:  Critical Infrastructure Manager 
From:  Oct 2012 to Present 
Current Responsibilities  
/square4 Devise process document to ensure the safety and 
structural integrity of life critical Infrastructur es. 
/square4 Implement high and low voltage installation and 
operation regulations for oil and gas, data centre 
infrastructures. 
/square4 Implement Reliability centred Maintenance process.   
/square4 Devise Emergency Operating Procedures for the 
building and systems. Plan and Organise resources 
for the projects, Report findings to senior buildin g 
engineer/ site managers and managers in other 
engineering discipline. (Civil, Mechanical, & Elect rical) 
/square4 Design and support ongoing development of 
engineering management tool “Galileo”. 
/square4 Perform condition based inspections, i.e. Vibratio n 
Analysis and partial Discharge testing on rotary an d 
high voltage installations respectively. 
/square4 Perform energy and sustainability audits and repor t 
the finding to the lead energy assessor. 
/square4 Aid clients to get their infrastructures accredite d by 
the Uptime Institute of New York and liaise with th e 
clients on a regular interval for performance appra isal. 
 
  Highlights 
/square4 Efficient in implementing Reliability Centred 
Maintenance & Condition Monitoring Programmes 
(RCM) & (CbM) 
/square4 Good Knowledge in reliability studies - FMEA, 
FMECA, Weibull analysis & calculations. 
/square4 Clear understanding in ISO 55000 asset management 
standards. 
/square4 People and Process management for critical 
infrastructures. 
/square4 Life cycle and critical spares management. 
/square4 Ability to produce reports to a professional stand ard. 
/square4 Excellent client facing experience. 
/square4 Clear understanding in energy management and 
computerized fluid dynamics (CFD) inspections for 
data rooms. 
/square4 Acquired security clearance from National Security  
Vetting agency.
